`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"Robert Skouson"}),(0,e.jsx)(t.br,{}),`
`,"In all my days, I have never seen such a magnificent water tower. Being in its presence has given me powers beyond comprehension. I have mastered flight in the downward direction. I have 100% recall of events that happened to me in the last 5 minutes. I have also discovered I am completely invisible when no one is looking. This water tower has changed my view of who I am, and my ultimate potential."]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(t.p,{children:"This guy even claims it to be holy water:"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.blockquote,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"Nicholas Martinez"}),(0,e.jsx)(t.br,{}),`
`,"This water from Wyatt P. Memorial Water tower has changed the way I see water, and drink it. Everytime I see this water tower, it makes me want quality water. Forget Poland Spring or Fiji. This is quality water! You know how in the Book of John Chapter 2, the Savior Jesus Christ turned water into wine? Well he actually turned already good wine to water from Wyatt P. Memorial Water tower."]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(t.p,{children:"This one might be my favorite:"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.blockquote,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"McKay Lush"}),(0,e.jsx)(t.br,{}),`
`,"Professionally speaking as a water tower enthusiast, this has to be one of the best water towers that I\u2019ve ever visited and I\u2019ve visited thousands. The divine structure of the 10 legs leading to the plumply, robust water basin is enough to get any man excited. The satisfying twang as you bang the side wall sends shivers down even the most hardened of souls. Never before has such a feat been attempted and accomplished. Truly this should be the EIGHTIETH WONDER OF THE WORLD."]}),`
`]}),`

`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:["So I opened a ticket. `,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:["Buckeye Billy, our lovely, nutty, history loving friend, has a birthday coming up! Billy is as cryptic as can be, and we have no idea what to get him for his birthday. We did find three hints on written on his desk. Can you help us find where we should buy a gift from?",(0,e.jsx)(t.br,{}),`
